-----Original Message-----

To: <EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com>
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Mel-8704 (emf)


Hi Steven,
 
I have 2 of them, the standard one and the one pro model with the  light.  
This is an awesome unit.  It is 3 devices all rolled into  one.  The inventor, 
Gary, is an awesome guy too.  He built this meter  and named it after his 
daughter so it has a sentimental value to him.  You  will love it .............
 
Jeff
